27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Safwan bin Sulaim narrated that the Prophet said:"The one who looks after a widow and a poor person is like the Mujahid in the cause of Allah, or like the one who fasts all the day and stands (in prayer) all the night

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي السَّعْىِ عَلَى الأَرْمَلَةِ وَالْيَتِيمِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Looking After The Widow And The Orphan
